body: I would go for MediaWiki, as it looks to have more wiki oriented approach, while Ning, may not be the best platform if we are not planning on using it as a forum too (we will be using this current [grasshopper3d group pages](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum) as a forum, right?). The MediaWiki [installation procedure](http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:Installation_guide) seems to be documented.
